histogram.name: Commerce.PriceDrops.{LocationIdentifier}.ContainsPrice
histogram.summary: Records if a page contains a price, as determined by the commerce data obtained to power the price drop feature. This data is acquired when the user finishes navigating to a page. Recorded when the user {LocationIdentifier}.

histogram.name: Commerce.PriceDrops.{LocationIdentifier}.ContainsPriceDrop
histogram.summary: Records if a page contains a decrease in price for an offer, relative to the previously seen price for the offer. This is determined by the commerce data obtained to power the price drop feature. The data is acquired when the user finishes navigating to a page. Recorded when the user {LocationIdentifier}.

histogram.name: Commerce.PriceDrops.{LocationIdentifier}.IsProductDetailPage
histogram.summary: Records if a page is a product detail page, as determined by the commerce data obtained to power the price drop feature. This data is acquired when the user finishes navigating to a page. Recorded when the user {LocationIdentifier}.
